topics.body: Well I finished Free! And all in all, it was okay. I have a few gripes with it though. It kind of fails as a sports series in that it never explains the rules and terminology of competitive swimming. And a lot of the character drama felt kind of forced. [spoiler]I also really hate how in the last episode Rei just got swept under the rug because Rin needed an emotional bitchslap. Because so far Rei is the most interesting character in the series.[/spoiler] If I had to say anything it's that the animation is nice and the characters, while not particularly well developed, bounce off of one another really well. But as for as sports anime go, ypu could do waaaaaaaaaaay better. Slam Dunk and Eyeshield 21 blow Free! out of the fucking water. [spoiler]That was a swimming pun[/spoiler]. Maybe things start kicking up in season 2 but as it stands now, I'm not all that interested in season 2.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
